warscrolls.name: Arch-Kavalos Zandtos
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Cavalry, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

melee.name: Kavalos Steed’s Hooves, Teeth and Barbed Tails

abilities.name: Spear of the Kavaloi
abilities.effect: When this unit uses a **CHARGE** ability, it can pass through models in enemy **INFANTRY** units as if it had **FLY**.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Charge
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy **INFANTRY** unit that it passed across to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Still Their Breath!
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly non-**HERO OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Arkhan the Black, Mortarch of Sacrament
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (3), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Razarak’s Ebon Claws** is 4.

abilities.name: Mortarch of Sacrament
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability
abilities.effect: If a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** unit wholly within 18" of this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 4+, ignore the effect of that spell on that unit. This unit can use this ability more than once per phase but only once per **SPELL** ability.

abilities.name: Curse of Years
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
Roll 10 dice. For each 6:

• Inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.
• Roll an extra dice.

For each 5+ on those extra dice, repeat the above bullet points. Then, do the same for each 4+, then each 3+, then each 2+.

abilities.name: The Doom of Traitors
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If the target is a **HERO**, double the amount of mortal damage inflicted.

abilities.name: The Staff of Spirits
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit. Each time this unit successfully casts a spell, **Heal (1)** this unit.

warscrolls.name: Bone-tithe Nexus
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Faction Terrain, Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

abilities.name: Deadly Gaze
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this terrain feature to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 4+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply:

***Punishment of Agony:*** Subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target until the start of your next turn.

***Punishment of Ignorance:*** Subtract 1 from casting rolls and/or chanting rolls for the target until the start of your next turn.

***Punishment of Lethargy:*** Halve the target’s Move characteristic until the start of your next turn.

***Punishment of Death:*** Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Bone-tithe Shrieker
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

abilities.name: No Escape
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from ward rolls for enemy units while they are within 12" of this **MANIFESTATION**.

warscrolls.name: Gothizzar Harvester
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

abilities.name: Repair Construct
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Return a number of slain models to the target with a combined Health characteristic equal to the number of **bone-tithe points** this unit has. Then, reset this unit’s **bone-tithe points** to 0.

abilities.name: Gruesome Surgery
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **INFANTRY** unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. For each model slain by this ability, you can return 1 slain model to a friendly **Mortek Guard** unit wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Bone Harvest
abilities.effect: Each time an enemy model from a unit in combat with this unit is slain, give this unit 1 **bone-tithe point**. This unit can have a maximum of 6 **bone-tithe points** at once.

warscrolls.name: Immortis Guard
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

abilities.name: Soulbound Protectors
abilities.effect: Add 1 to ward rolls for friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS HEROES** within this unit’s combat range. However, each time you make an unmodified ward roll of 1 for a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS HERO** within this unit’s combat range, allocate 1 damage point to this unit after the damage sequence for that **HERO** has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

warscrolls.name: Kainan's Reapers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers, Mortisan

abilities.name: Nadirite Bow
abilities.declare: If this unit’s **Nohem** is on the battlefield, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Mir Kainan
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Mir Kainan** is on the battlefield, it has **WIZARD (1)**.

warscrolls.name: Katakros, Mortarch of the Necropolis
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Inda-Khaat** is 3.

abilities.name: Prime Necrophoros
abilities.effect: Add 3 to the control scores of other friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** units while they are wholly within 18" of this unit.

abilities.name: Supreme Lord of the Bonereaper Legions
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** units wholly within 18" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to save rolls for the targets while they are wholly within 18" of this unit.

abilities.name: Mortarch of the Necropolis
abilities.effect: If this unit uses a **RELENTLESS DISCIPLINE** ability, that ability affects friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** units wholly within 18" of this unit instead of wholly within 12".

abilities.name: Aviarch Spymaster
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Reaction: Opponent declared a command for a unit within 18" of this unit
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 5+, that command has no effect, it still counts as having been used and the command points spent to use it are still lost.

warscrolls.name: Kavalos Deathriders
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Standard Bearer (1/5), Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

abilities.name: Deathrider Wedge
abilities.effect: When this unit uses a **CHARGE** ability, models in this unit can pass through models in enemy **INFANTRY** units as if this unit had **FLY**.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Charge
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy **INFANTRY** unit that it passed across to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Liege-Kavalos
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

melee.name: Kavalos Steed’s Hooves, Teeth and Barbed Tails

abilities.name: Spear of the Kavaloi
abilities.effect: When this unit uses a **CHARGE** ability, it can pass through models in enemy **INFANTRY** units as if it had **FLY**.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Charge
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy **INFANTRY** unit that it passed across to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Master of Cavalry
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **Kavalos Deathriders** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Morghast Archai
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

abilities.name: Discharge Armour
abilities.declare: If this unit has an **arcane charge token**, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS WIZARD** wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Remove this unit’s **arcane charge token**, then add 1 to casting rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Ebon-wrought Armour
abilities.effect:
This unit has **WARD (3+)** against damage points inflicted by **SPELL** abilities, **PRAYER** abilities and abilities used by **MANIFESTATIONS**.

If you make a successful ward roll for this unit, or if this unit destroys an enemy **MANIFESTATION**, give this unit an **arcane charge token**. This unit cannot have more than 1 **arcane charge token** at once.

warscrolls.name: Morghast Harbingers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

abilities.name: Harbingers of Death
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Heralds of Nagash
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a RELENTLESS DISCIPLINE ability
abilities.effect: This unit is affected by that **RELENTLESS DISCIPLINE** ability as if it were wholly within range of the friendly **HERO** picked to use it.

warscrolls.name: Mortek Crawler
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

abilities.name: Deathly Barrage
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that was targeted by all of this unit’s shooting attacks this phase to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly **Mortisan Ossifector**, and add 1 to the roll if any other friendly **Mortek** **Crawler** units picked that enemy unit to be the target of this ability this turn. On a 4+, the target has **STRIKE‑LAST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Mortek Guard
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Standard Bearer (1/10), Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

abilities.name: Shieldwall
abilities.effect: Ignore all modifiers to save rolls for this unit (positive and negative) for the rest of the turn if this unit did not use a **MOVE** ability in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Mortisan Boneshaper
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers, Mortisan

abilities.name: Boneshaper
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+:

• If the target is damaged, **Heal (3)** the target.
• If the target is not damaged, return a number of slain models to the target unit with a combined Health characteristic of up to 3.

warscrolls.name: Mortisan Ossifector
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers, Mortisan

abilities.name: Refined Creations
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Gothizzar Harvester**, **Morghast Archai** or **Morghast Harbingers** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Mortisan Soulmason
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (2), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers, Mortisan

abilities.name: Soul-guide
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** unit wholly within 12" of the caster to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: The target has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Mortisan Soulreaper
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers, Mortisan

abilities.name: Soulreaper
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for combat attacks made by enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Necrotic Impetus
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS INFANTRY** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Nagash, Supreme Lord of the Undead
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (9), Fly, Ward (5+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, subtract 3 from its power level.

abilities.name: Hand of Dust
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy **HERO** or **MONSTER** in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Hide a dice in one of your hands or under one of two appropriate containers. Your opponent must pick one of your hands or containers. If they pick the one hiding the dice, this ability has no effect. If they pick the empty one, the target is automatically destroyed.

abilities.name: Supreme Lord of the Undead
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HERO** non-**UNIQUE DEATH** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up a replacement unit identical to the target wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Invocation of Nagash
abilities.declare: This unit can cast this spell more than once per phase. Pick a visible unit wholly within 18" of this unit that has not been picked to be the target of this spell this turn to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
If the target is an enemy unit, inflict D3 mortal damage on it. If the target is a friendly **DEATH** unit, pick 1 of the following effects:

• Return a number of slain models to the target unit with a combined Health characteristic of up to 3.
• The target has **WARD (5+)** until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: The Staff of Power
abilities.effect: Add 2 to casting rolls for this unit while it has not miscast any spells this turn. If this unit miscasts a spell, ignore the restriction that would stop this unit from casting any more spells this turn.

warscrolls.name: Necropolis Stalkers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

abilities.name: Quadrarch Aspects
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects to apply for the rest of the turn:

***Domination Aspect:*** Subtract 3 from the control scores of enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

***Blade-parry Aspect:*** Subtract 1 from hit rolls for combat attacks that target this unit.

***Destroyer Aspect:*** Ward rolls cannot be made for damage points inflicted by this unit’s combat attacks.

***Precision Aspect:*** This unit’s melee weapons have **Anti-HERO (+1 Rend)** while this unit is in combat with an enemy **HERO**.

warscrolls.name: Nightmare Predator
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

abilities.name: Death Incarnate
abilities.effect: If this **MANIFESTATION** was destroyed or banished this turn and the unit that summoned it is on the battlefield, roll a dice. On a 4+, set up this **MANIFESTATION** again, wholly within 12" of the unit that summoned it and more than 9" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Mortek Guard
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Standard Bearer (1/10), Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

abilities.name: Shields of the Legion
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Phase (Army), Reaction: A friendly OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS WAR MACHINE, MONSTER or MORTISAN unit within this unit’s combat range was targeted by an ATTACK ability
abilities.effect: For the rest of the phase, subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of weapons used for attacks that target that friendly unit.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Mortisan Boneshaper
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers, Mortisan

abilities.name: Boneshaper
abilities.declare: If this unit is not in combat, pick a friendly **Mortek Guard** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Legion Quartermaster
abilities.effect: Each time a friendly non-**HERO OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

warscrolls.name: Soulstealer Carrion
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

abilities.name: Aviarch Sentry
abilities.effect: Subtract 5 from the control scores of enemy **INFANTRY** units while they are within 6" of this **MANIFESTATION**.

warscrolls.name: Teratic Cohort
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/8), Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

abilities.name: Hunters Unleashed
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **outflanking the enemy**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Predator's Cunning
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve **outflanking the enemy**. It has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Vokmortian, Master of the Bone-tithe
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (2), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Ossiarch Bonereapers

abilities.name: Mortal Contract
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be bound, pick a visible friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** unit wholly within 18" of this unit to be bound, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time the bound friendly unit is picked to be the target of an ability used by the bound enemy unit, roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the bound enemy unit equal to the roll as a reaction. If the bound enemy unit is destroyed by this ability, do not resolve the effect of the enemy ability.

abilities.name: Voice of Nagash
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, non‑**FIGHT CORE** abilities cost 1 command point for the target to use. Those abilities do not count as commands.

rules.name: Necrotic Symphony
rules.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS INFANTRY WIZARDS**.

rules.name: Swift as Death
rules.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS CAVALRY** units to be the targets.
rules.effect: Each target can move 6" but cannot end that move in combat.

rules.name: Disciplined Hekatoi
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
rules.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HERO** non-**FLY OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS INFANTRY** unit to be the target.
rules.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects to apply until the start of your next turn:

• The target has **WARD (5+)**.
• Add 1 to charge rolls for the target.
• Add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s attacks.
• The target’s melee weapons have **Anti-charge (+1 Rend)**.

rules.name: Plentiful Bone
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
rules.declare: Pick a friendly non-**UNIQUE OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS WIZARD** to use this ability, then pick up to 3 visible friendly non-**FLY OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** units wholly within 12" of that **WIZARD** to be the targets.
rules.effect:
Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+:
• If the target is damaged, **Heal (X)** the target where **X** is an amount equal to the roll.
• If the target is not damaged, return a number of slain models to it with a combined Health characteristic equal to or less than the roll.

rules.name: Send in the Reserve
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
rules.declare: Pick a friendly **Mortek Guard** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
rules.effect: Roll a dice. On a 5+, set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

rules.name: Crawling Barrage
rules.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **Mortek Crawler** units that are wholly within friendly territory and that have not used a **MOVE** ability this turn to be the targets.
rules.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for each target’s shooting attacks for the rest of the turn.

spells.name: Bolster Creation
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, ignore the first damage point allocated to the target in each phase.

spells.name: Invigorate the Ranks
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Soul-Claim
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the enemy target. Then, you can pick a visible friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** unit wholly within 12" of that **WIZARD** to be a friendly target. Then, make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect:
Inflict D3 mortal damage on the enemy target. If any models are slain by this ability, pick 1 of the following:

• **Heal (3)** the friendly target.
• Return a number of slain models to the friendly target with a combined Health characteristic of up to 3.

spells.name: Drain Vitality
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks and subtract 1 from save rolls for the target.

spells.name: Empower Nadirite Weapons
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: The target’s combat attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+ until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Shard Storm
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

spells.name: Summon Bone-tithe Shrieker
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Bone‑tithe Shrieker** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Bone-tithe Shrieker** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Nightmare Predator
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Nightmare Predator** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Nightmare Predator** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Soulstealer Carrion
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Soulstealer Carrion** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Soulstealer Carrion** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

artefacts.name: Helm of Tyranny
artefacts.effect: Subtract 2 from the control scores of enemy units while they are within 12" of this unit.

artefacts.name: Marrowpact
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefacts.effect: For the rest of the turn, if the unmodified hit roll for a combat attack that targets this unit is 1-2, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

heroicTraits.name: Mighty Archaeossian
heroicTraits.effect: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack that targets this unit is 1-3, the attack fails and the attack sequence ends.

heroicTraits.name: Aura of Sterility
heroicTraits.effect: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for shooting attacks that target friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Diversionary Tactics
heroicTraits.effect: Subtract 2 from charge rolls for enemy units while they are within 12" of this unit.

other.name: Collect the Tithe
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
other.declare: Pick the **Gothizzar Harvester** in this Regiment of Renown to use this ability, then pick a non-**HERO INFANTRY** unit (friendly or enemy) within its combat range to be the target.
other.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll equals or exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain, then give the unit using this ability 1 **bone-tithe point**.

other.name: Rebuild On The March
other.declare: Pick the **Gothizzar Harvester** in this Regiment of Renown to use this ability if it has 6 **bone-tithe points**. Then, pick another unit in this Regiment of Renown that has been destroyed to be the target.
other.effect: Reset the **Gothizzar Harvester**’s **bone-tithe points** to 0. Then, set up a replacement of the target unit with half the number of models (rounding up) wholly within 9" of the **Gothizzar Harvester** and more than 9" from all enemy units.

other.name: Soul Tax
other.declare:
Pick the **Mortisan Ossifector** in this Regiment of Renown to cast this spell, then:

• Pick a friendly unit, excluding units in this Regiment of Renown, to be the target.
• Pick a unit in this Regiment of Renown to be the **recipient**.

The target and the **recipient** must be wholly within 12" of and visible to the caster. Then, make a casting roll of 2D6.
other.effect:
Until the start of your next turn:

• The target has a maximum control score of 1.
• Add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls for the **recipient**’s combat attacks.

other.name: Bulwark of the Necropolis
other.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with a unit in this Regiment of Renown to be the target.
other.effect: Subtract 2D6 from the target’s control score for the rest of the turn.

other.name: Skeletal Splintering
other.declare: This spell can be cast by the same **WIZARD** more than once per phase. Pick the **Arkhan the Black** in this Regiment of Renown to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them that has not been picked to be the target of this spell this turn to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
other.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on that unit.

other.name: Unholy Sacraments
other.effect: Add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making banishment rolls for the **Arkhan the Black** in this Regiment of Renown, to a maximum of 3.

battleTraits.name: Impenetrable Ranks
battleTraits.declare: If no friendly units have used a **RELENTLESS DISCIPLINE** ability this phase, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS HERO** to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** have **WARD (5+)** while they are wholly within 12" of that **HERO**.

battleTraits.name: Unstoppable Advance
battleTraits.declare: If no friendly units have used a **RELENTLESS DISCIPLINE** ability this phase, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS HERO** to use this ability. All friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** units wholly within 12" of that **HERO** are the targets.
battleTraits.effect: Add 2" to the Move characteristic of each target for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Coordinated Charge
battleTraits.declare: If no friendly units have used a **RELENTLESS DISCIPLINE** ability this phase, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS HERO** to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to charge rolls for friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** units while they are wholly within 12" of that **HERO**.

battleTraits.name: Re-form Ranks
battleTraits.declare: If no friendly units have used a **RELENTLESS DISCIPLINE** ability this phase, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS HERO** to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, while they are wholly within 12" of that Hero, friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** units can use **CHARGE** abilities even if they used a **RETREAT** ability in the same turn.

battleTraits.name: Bludgeon
battleTraits.declare: If no friendly units have used a **RELENTLESS DISCIPLINE** ability this phase, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS HERO** to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** units while they are wholly within 12" of that **HERO**.

battleTraits.name: Counter-strike
battleTraits.declare: If no friendly units have used a **RELENTLESS DISCIPLINE** ability this phase, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS HERO** to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, friendly units’ melee weapons have **Anti‑charge (+1 Rend)** while they are wholly within 12" of that **HERO**.
